name: Plugins Manager
description: Adds menu item into Options menu to access UI for installing/removing additional plugins

0.12.changes:
- Added configurable plugin sources;

- Added "help", "available" and "upgrades" commands to cmd;

- Added displaying information about changes in version;

- Added caching images;

- Added tooltips in versions, with version changes;

- Fixed Standard Set tries to uninstall;

- Fixed error changing the color to red.

0.13.changes:
- Fixed show empty plugins list;

- Retry JAR download after failed downloads;

- Inform on potential JAR conflicts;

- Re-enable manager after failed JAR downloads;

- Make stats UUID less sensitive + detect CI, clouds and OS;

- Version management for libs;

0.14.changes:
- Added Plugins Manager button on toolbar

- Suggest to install missing plugins

- Load last test plan file after restarting

- Fixed update libraries

- Fixed plugins list loading

- Added "install-all-except" command to cmd;

0.15.changes: Fixed bug of 0.14 with NPE on initial install

0.16.changes:
- Added filter field in Plugins Manager

- Fixed PluginManagerCMD logging

- Added "install-for-jmx" command to cmd;

- Optimize downloading plugins repo on JMeter startup

0.17.changes:
- Added maven info to plugin description in dialog

- Fixed 'connection still allocated' bug

0.18.changes: - fixed pmgr upgrade for Windows users

0.19.changes: - fixed pmgr and plugin upgrade for Windows users
